title: When will the classes start at pesu for 1st year students?

comments.body: I swear this question is posted literally every 3 days. Just search on this subreddit or scroll back and see. It is not that hard. This platform is for reading as much as creating posts.

Ikr so impatient 
Later they will be begging for holidays which they won't be getting
doesnt starting late also mean less holidays?
Its not about being impatient about classes. The same question has been asked multiple times and is redundant. Someone else might have a valid question and people might miss it.
Instead of giving that long ass explanation you couldâ€™ve just told him the dates yk
No. That doesn't solve the problem. People need to know how to use reddit if they expect good answers from the people on this sub.
Instead of asking the same question again n again blud could have searched in this sub
NO. If people cared of how to use Reddit FAQs, **SEARCH BAR**, this wouldn't be a problem
